text: Vam zapreshchayetsya brat' v zheny materey, Sester, i vashikh docherey, I vashikh tetok s materinskoy i ottsovskoy storony, I docherey sester i brat'yev, I materey, vskormivshikh grud'yu vas, Sester molochnykh i materey vashikh suprug, Priyemnykh docherey, ostavlennykh na vashe popechen'ye, Ot zhen, s kotorymi vstupili vy uzhe v supruzheskuyu svyaz', A yesli ne vstupili - net grekha na vas (yeye vzyat' v zheny). Zhen synovey, kotoryye ot vashikh chresel, I vmeste - dvukh rodnykh sester, Razve chto eto sovershilos' ran'she, - Poistine, Allakh proshchayushch, miloserd
